title: Podcast 355: How Long COVID affects our brains & minds + how to use directed neuroplasticity to wire out COVID damage
description:
Sign up to Patreon to get access to the full session video & audio + additional exclusive bonuses: https://www.patreon.com/drcarolineleaf

EPISODE DESCRIPTION: In this podcast you will get a chance to listen to the second session I did at my recent Mental Health Retreat in Dallas, Texas.


EPISODE HIGHLIGHTS:

ðŸ§ How the COVID pandemic has affect our minds, brains, and bodies

ðŸ§ How to use directed neuroplasticity (the Neurocycle) to wire out harmful COVID PTSD effects 

ðŸ§ How Long COVID affects the brain + How to heal from long COVID 

ðŸ§ How social interaction & cognitive stimulation can heal our brains, minds, and bodies 

ðŸ§ How to help our children rewire any negative COVID effects
